## Description {#details}

Simple wrapper that does the following.

1) Lazily evaluate the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> to compute CSEable instructions. 2) Allows configuration of which instructions are CSEd through CSEConfig object. Provides a method called get which takes a CSEConfig object.

Definition at line 207 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-h">CSEInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### get() {#adc9920cf7e9bdd520ac6055d21bf39f1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>GISelCSEInfo &amp; GISelCSEAnalysisWrapper::get (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cseconfigbase">CSEConfigBase</a> &gt; CSEOpt, bool ReCompute=false)</>}>
Takes a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cseconfigbase">CSEConfigBase</a> object that defines what opcodes get CSEd.

If CSEConfig is already set, and the CSE Analysis has been preserved, it will not use the new CSEOpt(use Recompute to force using the new
CSEOpt).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-h/#l00217">217</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-h">CSEInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#l00442">442</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp">CSEInfo.cpp</a>.
